page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT, West Cambs.
page.content:
Most employment is found outside the area - larger villages (egKimbolton) towns eg Huntingdon, Bedford, Ketter ing, St Neots and Peterborough, Camb ridge, even London. School-leavers join training scheme/attend College. Unemployment below average?
Few farmers/smallholders + home-based work eg hairdressing, dressmaking, daily help/childminding. Post Office and Garage/Motor workshop Catworth, several small builder/decorators.
Employment outside survey area include advertising, butchery, computing, dent -ist, electrician, Gas Board, nursing, secretarial/office work, retailing, surveying, teaching, TV reporting. Shoemaking at Rushden, Northants.
For methods of travel, see TRANSPORT
